HomePage.description: Your ultimate companion for navigating life abroad. Discover essential apps, local prices, and insider tips for any country in the world.
HomePage.clickLongText: Click on any country to discover apps and local insights
HomePage.clickShortText: Click on any country to explore
HomePage.letOurAi: Let our AI travel planner create a personalized itinerary tailored to your interests, budget, and travel style.

AiTravelPlanner.title: AI Travel Planner
AiTravelPlanner.description: Craft your perfect itinerary in seconds. Our AI generates personalized travel routes based on your unique preferences and interests.
AiTravelPlanner.tellUs: Tell us about your dream trip and we'll create the perfect itinerary.
AiTravelPlanner.interestsPlaceholder: e.g. History, Nature, Food, Museums, Photography
AiTravelPlanner.yourGeneratedPlan: Your generated travel plan will appear here
AiTravelPlanner.fillTheForm: Fill out the form and generate your itinerary

CountryApps.notExist: The country you're looking for doesn't exist.
CountryApps.noAppData: No app data available yet for this country.
CountryApps.checkBackSoon: Check back soon as we add more countries!

CountryBanner.discoverApps: Discover essential apps, local insights, and travel costs for your journey.

CountryAppsWithFilter.appsAvailable: {count, plural, =0 {No apps available} one {# app available} other {# apps available}}
CountryAppsWithFilter.noAppsFound: No apps found in this category.

PriceGuide.estimate: Prices are estimates and may vary by location and season

ShareYourKnowledge.description: Help fellow travelers by sharing your experiences with local apps and services. Your insights make a difference!
ShareYourKnowledge.title: Add Your Tip
ShareYourKnowledge.subtitle: Share your experience to help other travelers
ShareYourKnowledge.countryPlaceholder: Select the country for your tip
ShareYourKnowledge.tipPlaceholder: Share your experience: How did this app help you? Any tips for first-time users? What should travelers know?
ShareYourKnowledge.successMessage: Your tip has been submitted successfully and will help other travelers!
ShareYourKnowledge.loginRequired: Please log in to share your tips

LoginPage.info: By continuing, you agree to our policies.

CulturalInsights.title: Cultural Insights
CulturalInsights.description: Things only locals usually know. Travel with respect and confidence.

ContributeGuide.title: Contribution Guidelines
ContributeGuide.list1Desc: Include details about when and where you used the app
ContributeGuide.list2Desc: Both pros and cons help other travelers
ContributeGuide.list3Desc: Mention your travel style and needs
ContributeGuide.list4Desc: Keep your feedback constructive and helpful

Profile.editDescription: Make changes to your profile here. Your changes will be visible to others
Profile.name: Name
Profile.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
Profile.addTripSuccess: Your changes have been saved successfully.
Profile.currentPhoto: Current photo will be kept unless you upload a new one
Profile.shareYourExperience: Share your travel experience with the community
Profile.shareTip: Share a travel tip or experience...

Footer.description: Your ultimate companion for navigating life abroad. Discover essential apps, local prices, and travel insights for any country worldwide.

homepage.title: Homepage - GlobalAppGuide
homepage.description: Your ultimate companion for navigating life abroad. Discover essential apps, local prices, and travel insights for any country worldwide.
homepage.keywords: travel apps, local prices, country guide, tourist apps, travel planner, essential apps, travel insights, expat guide

countryDetail.title: {country} - GlobalAppGuide
countryDetail.description: Discover essential apps and local prices for {country}. Find the best transportation, food delivery, and local service apps trusted by travelers.
countryDetail.keywords: {country} apps, {country} travel guide, {country} local prices, {country} essential apps, travel to {country}

aiTravelPlanner.title: AI Travel Planner - GlobalAppGuide
aiTravelPlanner.description: Craft your perfect itinerary in seconds with our AI-powered travel planner. Get personalized travel routes based on your preferences, budget, and interests.
aiTravelPlanner.keywords: AI travel planner, trip planner, itinerary generator, travel route planner, personalized travel, AI trip planning

culturalInsights.title: Cultural Insights - GlobalAppGuide
culturalInsights.description: Discover cultural insights, local customs, and essential etiquette tips for countries around the world. Travel smarter with cultural knowledge.
culturalInsights.keywords: cultural insights, local customs, travel etiquette, cultural differences, travel tips, cultural awareness

shareKnowledge.title: Share Your Knowledge - GlobalAppGuide
shareKnowledge.description: Help fellow travelers by sharing your experiences with local apps and services. Contribute your tips and become part of our community.
shareKnowledge.keywords: share travel tips, contribute, travel community, travel experiences, app recommendations, travel advice

signIn.title: Sign In - GlobalAppGuide
signIn.description: Sign in to GlobalAppGuide to save your favorite apps, create trip itineraries, and share your travel experiences with the community.
signIn.keywords: sign in, login, user account, member login

register.title: Create Account - GlobalAppGuide
register.description: Join GlobalAppGuide community and unlock exclusive features. Create your account to save favorites, plan trips, and share your experiences.
register.keywords: register, sign up, create account, join, new member

profile.title: {userId}'s Profile | GlobalAppGuide
profile.description: View {userId}'s travel experiences, trip itineraries, and shared tips on GlobalAppGuide. Discover their favorite destinations and recommendations.
profile.keywords: user profile, traveler profile, travel experiences, trip itineraries, {userId}
